campaign.story:
Hey Everyone!
I'm raising funds to dedicate three months to exclusively work on my new book about the true feminine and masculine in today's sexually homogenized culture.  Check out the full book summary in italics at the bottom, or watch the video!
The $15k will be used to pay my living expenses while I go to France, Italy and Greece. Sounds luxurious but this is no lux trip! The amount I would be spending to support myself in LA, matches the cost in Europe.  The primary point to going abroad is to get away from daily life, hole away and focus.  Also, there's some research I'd like to do in each of these places on ancient perspectives on masculinity, femininity and sexuality. And lastly, I am always deeply inspired when in these places, so it seems like the perfect fit.
Serendipitously, I got an offer to sublet my apartment for the exact three months I was looking to go away, which means the majority of my living expenses for LA are already covered.
Thought I should mention... any funding BEYOND $15k that's raised would be amazing! And would go toward my living expenses when I come back to LA so I can keep charging through.
Additionally in the total amount, I've accounted for the 10% fee Kickstarter will take, and the conversion rate from dollar to euro.
Another amazing way to help instead of funding would be to DONATE a place to stay, negotiate a good rate, OR arrange for lodging in one month increments if you happen to have access to a place in any of these countries. 
Also, if you need to make a more discrete donation, please go to my website, www.StephanieAllen.com/FundMe where you can pay by cc via paypal -YOU DO NOT HAVE TO HAVE A PAYPAL ACCOUNT- where it will read 'ICG Consulting' on your statement.
DETAILED BUDGET
Airplane ticket: $1,500
Leftover monthly expenses from LA: $500/month                               $1,500 TOTAL
LIVING EXPENSES IN EUROS
Daily expenditure: 50 euro (1,500/month)                                              4,500 euro TOTAL
Lodging: 1,000 euro /month (or free!?),                                                  3,000 TOTAL
Monthly travel (research trips, sanity check) LODGING: 30 euro/night, 8 nights/month = 240 euro /month TRANSPORT: 100 RT, 3x month= 300 Euro 550/month                                                                                     1,650 TOTAL
TOTAL EURO LIVING EXPENSES = 9,200 = about $10,000
Emergency Cushion (in case of the unspeakable, or mis-calculation): $2,000
=$14,000
Kickstarter fee: up to $1,500
GRAND TOTAL: $15,500 ish
BOOK SUMMARY: 
"This book offers a model of the masculine and the feminine that gives new understanding to how to interact as men and women in order to create a magnetic, electric, and powerful connection that thrives on our differences and necessitates equality. This is a guide to true empowerment as men, as women, and as a couple.
After a decade of my study of masculinity and femininity through my seven years as a sensual body worker, host of a sex-talk show and my own sexual awakening through my personal relationships as a millennial woman, I’ve learned what captivates men and endlessly excites them, is a truly feminine woman. And what women truly long for, is a man amongst men. We want polarity. We crave it by design with our whole being, physically, mentally and spiritually. Like the north and south poles of the Earth, a magnet, or a battery. Like the sun and the moon, like night and day. We crave polarity because we need it to survive and to thrive as a world, as a society, as partners and lovers, as men and as women. Yet we also crave equality.
Our human history has, largely, only ever known the oppressed feminine and the oppressive male. Therefore, we need the ‘Strong Female’ and the ‘Sensitive Male’ archetypes of today. Yet, our efforts to find balance mean women are taking on more masculine characteristics in order to be seen as competitive in the male dominated world, yet in doing so, often abandon the ‘softer’ side of their femininity. Meanwhile, men are taking on more feminine characteristics in an attempt to avoid being a participant in the patriarchy, abandoning the very force that acts as a barrier of entry to the beloved women in their lives, their masculinity. In our attempt to become equal, we are also becoming the same. But what happens to a world that has lost its poles?
What happens to the magnet that has no positive, and no negative? Or the battery? There is no energy. And without energy, we are incapable of powering anything. Our world, our relationships or ourselves. Without polarity, there is no attraction, no electricity, no connection. Yet ironically, we live in a time where one could argue there is the most connection. We live in a world who’s economy is fueled by our sexual desires- our ‘attraction’. Where social media and the internet allow us to stay in touch and reach more human beings than ever before, where we can marry whomever we want for love. We live in a time of sexual liberation, with polyamory and a hook-up culture, where women are free to have sex without being shamed. Attraction, magnetism, electricity seem to be ubiquitous between men and women. But how deep are the ways we know to connect currently taking us? How much power are we actually generating from our current interactions? 
Because of this homogenization of the sexes, masculinity and femininity, our sexual poles that lead us to connect with one another in the strongest way a human being can experience, are operating form a deformed state, leaving us at a fraction of our sexual and relational potential. So how do we do it? How do we attain equality, and avoid sameness? How do we exist as polar, yet equal opposites? What do these polarities even look like in the face of equality? These are questions our world is only now ready to answer.
Through analysis and philosophy, woven into my personal experiences through sex work and an evolving sexuality as a millennial woman, this book will explore:
.What composes masculinity, what it’s function in the world is, what it needs to do its job, what factors deform masculinity and how deformed femininity results in deformed masculinity. 
.What composes femininity, what it’s function in the world is, what it needs to do its job, what factors deform femininity and how deformed masculinity results in deformed femininity.
.What ‘surrender’ and ‘submission’ really are and why it is key to the nature of femininity
.What ‘domination’ really is and why it is key to the masculine
.The current state of masculinity and femininity, where it is out of balance and how it got there. 
.How all of this creates imbalance in our personal lives, our relationships and the bedroom. 
.How to be a magnetic woman- a strong, yet truly feminine creature that will ignite and captivate men.
.How to be a magnetic man- sensitive and nurturing yet strong and leading, who attracts endless women
.Why we criticize and objectify women’s bodies and not men’s
.How our misunderstanding of the terms ‘sexist’ and ‘feminist’ are hurting us
And more..."

campaign.story:
You don't have to look far today to see examples of chaos and disharmony in the world. This is because, we, as individuals fail to do our part to heal our lives. When we heal ourselves, we are healing the world around us too. The ultimate objective of this project is to create a world filled with forgiving human beings responding to the challenges of the day with compassion and a desire for unity and peace over retribution and suffering.    
The Power of Forgiveness: A Guide to Healing and Wholeness is a comprehensive handbook to forgiveness as a personal healing practice. Forgiveness is an act of self-empowerment. It empowers us to create the lives we dream of by releasing our psychological and spiritual attachment to the past. As we create space for healing and transformation, we come to realize the true power of forgiveness to transform our lives. 
This fundraising campaign will provide the resources needed to complete the production, promotion, marketing, and distribution of the book - The Power of Forgiveness: A Guide to Healing and Wholeness. 
This book came into being almost magically. I have been writing a memoir for over four years, plodding along at a merciless pace and feeling like it would never end. So, I know all too well how painful the process can be. Not so with this project. I decided to write it in April, started writing (with the indispensable help of my editor, Nirmala Nataraj) in May and completed all ten chapters by the end of June! Yes, really! And, while it was a grueling two months for both of us it was also inspirational and, in many ways, life changing! As I go back and read the pages today, frankly, I wonder where the hell it all came from. My hope is that everyone who reads the book will feel the same fundamental healing energy I feel as I turn the pages. 
In addition to pre-ordering the eBook (Amazon or Kindle) or paperback edition of the book at a discount, we are also offering a limited edition Power of Forgiveness bookmark and daily inspirational cards written by the author and created to provide us with the reminders and support we all need on our path toward wholeness. Feeling a little lost? Just pull a card and get centered. The bookmarks and card decks are available as individual rewards or as part of the Personalized Forgiveness Package, which also includes a hand autographed copy of the book!
The Power of Forgiveness: A Guide to Healing and Wholeness
                Finding Forgiveness Inspirational Cards
                The Power of Forgiveness Bookmark
 I am also offering many of the services provided at the Forgiveness Academy. With the "Let's Talk!" reward you will receive an autographed copy of the paperback 1st edition, access to online meditations and resources, plus a 1-hour forgiveness consultation with the author or admission to a workshop anywhere in the United States. The "Let's Work!" reward is the best deal with three months of one-on-one coaching with the author in addition to Personalized Forgiveness Package! 
Last but not least, a few of you will be able to become a part of the movement with a major contributor acknowledgment in the book and lifetime access to Forgiveness Academy courses and events by supporting the project with the "A Lifetime of Love" pledge. We are planning to launch three online courses in 2017 and I will be speaking throughout the U.S.  
Budget
The following funding will help get the book on shelves and in the hands of supporters like you. And, as you know, we either make it or we don’t. This is a baseline budget to complete the next phase of the project. 
Book cover design and production $3,150
Printing for the first run of 500 paperback editions $1,179 
ISBN and bar code purchase $350 
Copyright registration $115
Video support $500
PR / Promo $5,000 
Marketing $5789
Fees $905
STRETCH GOAL: $24,979 to help make the book a bestseller! Here’s where additional funds raised will go: Additional print runs and a strategic national marketing and public relations campaign. 
Pro Bono services: Can you contribute design, production, or publishing support? I would love to speak with you. Are you a bookstore or distributor? Let's talk. As you know, this is the single biggest challenge for a project like this. Are you a reviewer or expert in the field of forgiveness or spirituality willing to offer your support? I would be truly honored to speak with you. 
Schedule
Design and formatting will be completed in December - January. The eBook should be available on the platform of your choice by the beginning of February. Printing will be completed in February, and we plan to begin distributing by the end of that month or early March. For rewards that include the Finding Forgiveness Inspirational Cards and Bookmark, we are estimating a late March or early April delivery to be conservative. Signed books will go out at the end of March or early April.
The Book
The Power of Forgiveness is a comprehensive guide to forgiveness as a healing practice. The author makes the crucial point that, for us to be the most empowered versions of ourselves in the world, we must prioritize our healing. And forgiveness is the most important path toward healing that we can undertake.
The book is made up of three distinct parts. Part I engages the reader in considering what forgiveness is, what it isn’t, and why it is so important to participate in this powerful and often misunderstood process. 
Part II reveals the framework and process. The author offers readers a comprehensive roadmap with a series of written exercises and guided meditations toward forgiveness. The structure she provides helps to strengthen the competencies we need to forgive fully. 
The final section of the book discusses concepts related to forgiveness that deepen our understanding of the healing practice. In considering the impact of personal forgiveness on the world around us, Hooks shows us in great detail how people who practice forgiveness in their daily lives have the capacity to heal both themselves and the world. 
About the Author
Emily J. Hooks (me!) is an author and the founder of the Forgiveness Academy. I am on a quest to make the world a more forgiving, compassionate place! 
Why? Good question. 
Fourteen years ago I was homeless. After a four-year journey through hell and an addiction that left me very near death many times, I experienced a moment of grace that sparked a determination to live and find my purpose in life. This project and the work I do was born out of the suffering I endured, the lessons I learned over the past decade and a half of healing and practicing forgiveness in every area of my life.     
In truth, fourteen plus years has not been easy. Healing work is hard work. I’m sure you’ve all heard the expression, “living life on life’s terms.” Well, that’s not always a breeze. And, sometimes I still kick and scream but what I have come to understand is that all real transformation happens in the space of non-resistance, or embracing things just the way they are. I’ve said it for many years (just ask my son who can begrudgingly confirm), “You can’t get any traction unless you’re standing on the truth.” 
But here’s the real miracle. I started systematically forgiving everyone in my life a long time ago. This process became a part of who I am. And, I didn’t even realize it. I certainly didn’t know the power of sharing my story and understanding of the process with others. Then one day not too long ago, I started talking with some friends about forgiveness, and everything changed. It was that simple. I started writing and working with others, and here we are today. My world is nothing like I could have ever imagined. And, I am so, so grateful for every day. 
Thank you for your support. I am grateful for each of you and know, without a doubt, that this book will help you heal your wounds and transform your life. Namaste. 
Want to hear a little more about the book? Check out this interview on World Spirituality Radio: http://www.unity.fm/episode/WorldSpirituality_102516 
Want to hear what others are saying about my work? http://emilyjhooks.com/testimonials/.

The stretch goal is included as an ultimate goal to reach the most people via promotion and creative PR to make this a best seller! Together we can do this!

updates.update_userinfo: The Audiobook is Out! That's a Wrap!
updates.update_content:
Friends,
As promised, the audio version of The Power of Forgiveness has been delivered to all of the supporters who pledged for it! Thank you! Had I known what an undertaking producing and releasing an audiobook would be...Ha! It was an adventure but I am very grateful it is out there for the world!

It turns out getting books to incarcerated women in the State of Texas is much easier said than done! It has been quite a process but I have great news! Thirty of the 44 donated books have been shipped! Two books will be delivered to each female or co-ed facility in Texas run by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice.
The last 14 books will be going to individual women participating in a program run by an amazing non-profit here in Austin - Truth Be Told. 
Thank you again (and finally) for your generosity and support. The Power of Forgiveness is now available online at all the major retailers and in stores here in Austin at BookPeople and Half-Priced Books. I am working on the audio book and second print edition now. Thank you for helping spread the message of hope and healing to others.

If you did not receive your survey from BackerKit it might have been filtered into your spam folder. You can use this link to access the survey: https://forgivenessbook.backerkit.com/. You will just need to enter the email associated with your Kickstarter account to access your personalized survey. 
Thanks, Carol for asking.

Friends,
Happy New Year! I just wanted to send a quick note and remind everyone who has not completed the survey from BackerKit to do so ASAP. The deadline is fast approaching and the information is necessary to complete your order. It should only take 2-5 minutes to complete. Feel free to reach out to me if you have questions.

Friends,
Together, we did it! Thanks to 183 backers we made our goal plus some ($17,086!). I am so excited to bring the book and other goodies to each of you and to others who I have faith will find real value in the message. 
Speaking of others, thanks to those of you who contributed to the "Make a Difference, Read a Book!" Reward, I will be donating 36 books to incarcerated women in the State of Texas. Wow! Thank you!

Thank you, Patrice, for pointing out that the link in my last update doesn't work. Sending this so you have it in your emails. I also corrected the last update. The link is https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/forgiveness/the-power-of-forgiveness-book. <3

Friends,
I can't believe it, but we are only 22 hours from the end of the campaign! It's been an amazing month for me. I've had the opportunity to spend lots of time firmly outside of my comfort zone (something I intend to take a short break from for a few days very soon!). I've had a chance to reflect on the meaning of relationship and the importance of the work I am honored and humbled to do. During the past month, my faith in purpose and in "not knowing" and not needing to know how things will unfold has deepened exponentially. My appreciation for relationships over and above all else is clearer now than ever. It's funny how we can set out to do one thing, and so many other unexpected blessings emerge.

updates.update_userinfo: New reward and 6 days to go!
updates.update_content:
Friends,
I wanted to take a moment and say thanks to our newest backers! Terri, Scott, Tinnekke, Michelle, Autumn, Ron, Tyffany, Magaline, Team Creatio, and Kellie! Thank you all for your support and generosity. We still have a long way to go but I have faith it will fund and that the book will be out early next year as planned.

We are so close! Thank you for your support of the project! It has been an exciting, albeit stressful few weeks but I am very optimistic we will be successful! We are currently funded at 68% thanks to 86 generous backers! We have 8 more days to cross the finish line!
Now, during this final push to the finish line, I want to ask one last favor. Give some thought to the people in your life who you think might appreciate and benefit from the message of the healing power of forgiveness. Maybe you know therapists, ministers, counselors, teachers, healers, coaches, or others who already have a thorough understanding of the importance of this subject and are always looking for new resources. Perhaps you have clients or friends who would appreciate a new, thoughtful point-of-view.

comments.content: Congratulations Emily ... I agree ... healing begins with forgiveness. WTG ...

campaign.story:
"The Cobblestone Wars" is an archival documentary that uses narration and illustration to tell the story of Manhattan and Brooklyn's underworld during the early 1900’s. This is the birth of the American Gangster and although many books have been written and many movies made, numerous key figures from this era have gone missing. Characters like Monk Eastman who ran the lower east side alongside others carved out sections of Manhattan as their turfs. These hoodloms grew in numbers as the skyscrapers started to bloom. This was the birth of Modernism and New York City as we know it today.
The Eastman Gang's Headquarters, Chrystie Street, Manhattan 1901
It’s more than just the stories of the gangsters, It’s New York City as a whole. Other crucial moments of New York will be addressed including the Birth of Electricity, the General Slocum Disaster, the Triangle Fire, Audrey Munson, and Coney Island. It’s an endless list of health hazards and political incorrectness. It’s without a doubt New York’s most forgotten time period.
The Bowery at Grand Street, Manhattan 1905
Production of the film will consist of archival, chronological illustrative and documentary footage. The funds will pay for archival illustration, narration, editing, production, post production and distribution. In addition various authors on the subjects will be interviewed. Books such as Monk Eastman: The Gangster Who Became a War Hero by Neil Hanson and The Starker: New York City’s First Great Gangster Boss by Rose Keefe will help build the narrative. With your help, we can make this documentary a reality. Your support will do more than make a documentary. It will forever enrich the lives of those looking to seek information on the origins of the New York Gangster.
The Tombs, New York 1900's
This forgotten history of the New York underworld will finally be told. Thanks to your help!
Vaudeville at Union Square, Manhattan 1910
  Kid Dropper's funeral, Manhattan 1923

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are very little risks and challenges. Working on this project for over 8 years I know exactly what story has to be told. I've amassed an encyclopedia of information and have sorted it into a clear 30 page narrative. I have illustrators, editors, producers and an incredibly talented team ready to tackle this project. The only obstacles that could present themselves would be licensing issues or a lack of involvement from various authors I plan to interview on the subject. 

Additional risks such as not gaining rights to archival footage won’t be a problem as the New York Public library has a massive library with images and video that are now public domain. Any production issues such as editing, sound or illustration would be an easy fix as I have a large list of production resources here in New York City.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
In 1843, Charles Dickens published his timeless novella, A Christmas Carol. The story introduced one of literature's most widely-recognized characters, a bitter old miser known as Ebenezer Scrooge.
Scrooge is greedy, cold-hearted, contemptuous toward his fellow man, and generally without virtue.
Remind you of anyone?
This project is simple: I'm replacing each instance of Ebenezer and/or Scrooge in Dickens' original text with Donald and/or Trump. That's it. I'll take the resulting text and publish an updated edition of the book.
The plan is to publish a standard trade paperback. The book will be 6 x 9 inches (15.24 x 22.86 centimeters), and the interior will feature cream paper and black text. If the project were to overfund there would be room to explore including John Leech's original illustrations, or updated versions of them (as below).
I should be able to begin a production run as soon as this campaign has hit its baseline goal. So while I've set January as the estimated delivery date on tiers that include the book, I am endeavoring to fulfill before Christmas.
  Part of the reason you've seen so many different renditions and adaptations of A Christmas Carol is because the work is in the public domain. Since there is no longer a copyright on Charles Dickens' original story, transformative works are permissible.
That said, am I worried about being sued by the President Elect? You bet.
Naturally, there will be some folks who find this endeavor in poor taste. To you, my friends, I say only that A Christmas Carol is ultimately a hopeful story. It is one of redemption, about recognizing the error of your ways before it's too late. Let us look upon and celebrate our fellow man, it suggests, no matter their station.
Is it unfair to compare Donald Trump to Ebenezer Scrooge? Maybe. After all, Scrooge worked his way up from nothing.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Let's start with the big one — I'm not 100% sure I can get this book in your hands by Christmas Day. The edit is well underway, and I can begin production as soon as this project passes the initial goal, but even then it's going to be tight. That said, my understanding is that Trump will not actually be haunted by three spirits until Inauguration Eve. So maybe you're okay getting it before then?

Also, I've never worked with this particular book printer before, and there is always a chance of delays or unfortunate production errors. But, they do come highly recommended and it has been suggested they might be able to make the tight turnaround.

So with that said, I will do everything in my power to get these books printed and to you as soon as possible. No matter what, I will keep you updated throughout the process, via Kickstarter's project updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: "Christmas is Back. Bigger and Better Than Ever Before."
updates.update_content:
"We're bringing Christmas back, and we say it now with pride. Let me just say to those here today and all across the country: Merry Christmas to everybody. And also Happy Holidays, and a great new year. We're gonna have a great great year." - Trump, December 4, 2017
To celebrate Trump's historic pivot towards inclusivity, we're rolling out some deep discounts on the book. Get it now on Amazon for just $5.99! Take advantage of this low low price and stuff all your stockings.
Tell your friends too!

Greetings from Trump's America.
I wanted to share something with you all. You see, once the book was in production and I had fulfilled all of your rewards, I went ahead and made the book available on Amazon. Since my initial costs (editing, cover design, setup, manufacturing, and shipping) had already been covered by this campaign, I could have listed the book for a cheaper drop-ship price on Amazon... but that felt like a weird thing to do, considering what you paid here on Kickstarter. So, I went ahead and priced it identical to the Ghost of Christmas Present tier, and never looked back.

On June 16th, 2015, a reality television personality and failed steak salesman announced his candidacy for President. In addressing the problems facing our nation, he said:
“When Mexico sends its people, they’re not sending their best. They’re not sending you. They’re not sending you. They’re sending people that have lots of problems, and they’re bringing those problems with us. They’re bringing drugs. They’re bringing crime. They’re rapists. And some, I assume, are good people.”

updates.update_userinfo: An Exhaustive List of Trump's Hauntings
updates.update_content:
“I am here to-night to warn you, that you have yet a chance and hope of escaping my fate. A chance and hope of my procuring, Donald.”
“You were always a good friend to me,” said Trump. “Thank’ee!”
“You will be haunted,” resumed the Ghost, “by Three Spirits.” Trump’s countenance fell almost as low as the Ghost’s had done.
Hey folks! The books arrived today and they are pretty great. I packed them up and made a couple of trips over to the post office.
We've done it! Thanks to you, the world no longer has to suffer without a proper Trump Edition of Dickens' classic tale.

"I realize that there are some businessmen who feel only they want to be left alone, that Government and politics are none of their affairs, that the balance sheet and profit rate of their own corporation are of more importance than the worldwide balance of power or the Nationwide rate of unemployment. But I hope it is not rushing the season to recall to you the passage from Dickens' 'Christmas Carol' in which Ebenezer Scrooge is terrified by the ghosts of his former partner, Jacob Marley, and Scrooge, appalled by Marley's story of ceaseless wandering, cries out, 'But you were always a good man of business, Jacob.' And the ghost of Marley, his legs bound by a chain of ledger books and cash boxes, replied, 'Business? Mankind was my business. The common welfare was my business. Charity, mercy, forbearance and benevolence were all my business. The dealings of my trade were but a drop of water in the comprehensive ocean of my business!'

campaign.story:
It's a powerful planner, a self-development tool and a business-life coach combined in one single book-planner, designed to give you the ability to set goals and keep track of your progress.
You're overwhelmed and don't know what to focus on next. Am I right?  
How many doubts assail you every day: Is it a good business idea?  
Will it be successful?
 Will this investment be profitable?
 Is it the right time to start?
 Doing business today is a continual obstacle course and reasons to surrender abound: red tape, unexpected financial situations, stress, goals which become unreachable, business plans that don’t go as expected.  
Start taking consistent, inspired action every single day with my simple yet super powerful daily Book-planner designed so that you can achieve more in 5 days than most people do in a month!
 The Design your business in 365 days helps YOU reach your goals in 2017! 
  One Book Planner that would allow us to plan, set goals, provided pages for notes, and blank pages for drawing and sketching.   It has been interesting to see what we have been able to accomplish by setting goals and taking action. We have all been taught this principle before… 
"You will never succeed if you don’t try". 
  Making your dreams into realities requires that you take that first step of setting goals and making plans. What better way to do this than with a pen and paper?   To us, there is no replacement to the feeling of planning, brain storming and taking notes, with a good old fashion pen and paper. However there is nothing old fashioned about this bookplanner. We have countless innovations and page layouts that will both simplify and improve your business. 
Let's take a Look! Design your business in 365 days!
   Organise all your ideas in one place
Achieving a goal takes THREE steps:
• Visualize your goal 
• Make a plan 
• Stay accountable 
With the Bookplanner, you will be able to visualize all your ideas at a glance and decide which ones you are most excited about. It will  help you to stay motivated and committed throughout the process of bringing an idea to life.
  Each page looks different with exercises, quotes, tips and everything that may help you to build your dream day after day.
DAILY ACHIEVEMENTS Great things come to those who plan for them. Lay out your big plans and grand dreams, and keep a record of what you achieve and when.
DAILY TIPS Daily tips helping you to build your business day by day.
DAILY QUOTE A daily quote to inspire and motivate you each day during your transformation.
DAILY BLANK SPACE Blank space for your thoughts.
WEEKLY CALENDARS Weekly calendar spreads so you can keep track of all your important dates, reminders and appointments.
WEEKLY GOALS & DAILY CHALLENGES Track your daily goals and challenge yourself to create (or break) a habit. Success is *all* about consistency.
WEEKLY FOCUS A weekly focus guides you in drawing the best out of your idea to create transformative change.
WEEKLY QUESTIONS FOR REFLECTION Weekly questions for reflection help you to learn better.
WEEKLY GOALS & WEEKLY LEARNINGS Each week there is a place to recognize your progress, learn from your mistakes and plan how you intend to proceed. And of course plenty of blank, flexible space to be used for your big thoughts and grand ideas.
WEEKEND CHALLENGES Designed for time blocking – that way you can plan your weekend and always know that you are working on something that matters.
HAND-CRAFTED & ARTFULLY BOUND TO LIE FLAT NO MATTER WHAT Each book-planner is put together by hand. This is not just a planner; it is also design, a craft, a work of art. We use a special binding so that the planner lies flat, no matter what page you are on.   It has your weekly calendar, weekly schedule, goal visualizer and spending plan all built in. Plan your life and manage your money to live the life you want. Make lists, schedule appointments and stay inspired by regularly visiting your goal pages.
Make smart spending decisions to live the life you have dreamed!
FOCUS ON THE GOALS: weekly and daily focus sections allow you to concentrate your attention on the most important things in your life. 
DECLUTTER: this book-planner is a place to declutter your mind, enabling you to visualise your goals and focus on the present - as well as laying everything on the table so you know just what you need to do.  
MANAGE YOUR TIME: a daily appointment calendar allows you to easily keep track of how you spend your time. 
TEST YOURSELF: weekly challenges give you the chance to measure what you’ve done and learned each day.
TAKE ACTIONS: prioritising to-do lists in terms of both personal and professional goals means that they do not vanish into oblivion.
INCREASE PRODUCTIVITY: the certainty of results and self-confidence, are an incentive to go even further and do even better. 
REDURE STRESS AND WORRY: with this personal coach alongside you, you’ll get to know yourself better day by day and learn to manage the unexpected anxiety that comes with transformation.
And one more item of note: BACKERCLUB.CO,
 the exclusive club for Kickstarter Backers, has chosen this project to feature on their site! Here is the information on them: BackerClub is an exclusive club for people who love Kickstarter and back a ton of projects. BackerClub is featuring our campaign in the Club this week. 
We're excited about what they are doing and hope you like it too!
And GADGET FLOW support our campaign 
   We are a creative team with big dreams. In a digital era, we look to paper to offer a new way of reading: slow and deliberate, day after day, week after week, up to the point of achieving change over the course of a full year. We dedicated our time to the creation of this book-planner, which is a concentration of not only experience, methodology and determination, but also passion, imagination and enthusiasm, on every page, for 52 weeks. 
We developed different layouts that we tested on our own and then passed on to others for feedback. After receiving feedback we finalized the design and have loved what we have come up with, and we know you will too.  Our mission is to encourage people to dream big and help bring about change.   Who wouldn’t want a personal coach available around the clock to overcome obstacles, there during those demotivating moments that arise during the course of starting or running a business? 
 That’s why we made Design your Business in 365 Days: a book-planner to create a fool-proof business plan and reach your entrepreneurial objectives in 52 weeks. Whether you run a start-up or a company in its early stages, if you’re a freelancer just starting out, or even if you aren’t a professional, anyone with a passion, a dream to be realised, can benefit from Design your Business in 365 Days.
  For those creatives who need a little more structure  
For those structured individuals who need a little more creativity/spontaneity  
For those who like to journal, reflect, and the freedom of blank space
For those who feel overwhelmed with cluttered thoughts
For those juggling multiple lives                      
For those who have a dream to be realized
Organize your life. Make smart money decisions. Track progress.
 DREAMS become reality!
Accomplishing amazing things isn't about being superhuman. It's not about being perfect. It's about having the right tools, the right system, and the right plan. “Design your Business in 365 Days” helps you to put all those things right in one place. When you put pen to paper something powerful happens. Your ideas become more real. Your commitment grows. You can literally see yourself making progress.
This is YOUR CHANGE to create a personalized, step-by step route to your goals. Are you feeling overwhelmed by what you’ve taken on? So much to do, so little time and so many aspects to running a business that you hadn’t realized would be important - and which you don’t really know much about.
Do you struggle to finish things you’ve started?
Do you need help to think your ideas through, prioritize and commit only to your best ideas?
Are you working non-stop but not really getting where you want to be?
Yes, yes and YES? 
PLEDGE TODAY if you want 2017 to be your best year yet
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are designing our project to be relatively low-risk.
 We want to guarantee that we will be able to sustain ourselves in the long term by keeping our costs low. Nevertheless, the more donations and subscriptions we can secure, the easier it will be to stay afloat.

Designing, printing and shipping a planner has many moving parts. I have a great team that is very experienced in the details of creating and delivering a high-quality planner; they are dedicated to making this project a success. Of course, the biggest challenge is going to be the logistical one of coordinating printing and distribution. Fortunately, we are ensuring that this process will go smoothly by partnering with people who have significant expertise in the field. We have secured a highly-regarded printer and distributor. But we are fundamentally committed to getting you something of great quality, and we are going to enlist whatever expertise is necessary in order to get your bookplanner in your hands on time. The bookplanner is under Copyright protection and may not be produced, distributed or used for commercial or personal purposes without our express permission. All we ask in advance is for patience and that backers respond to the information survey as quickly as possible after this Kickstarter ends so we can get your bookplanner in your hands ASAP. Problems may arise (they always do...), but the vendors I am working with have a history of producing quality products on time. It is their job, and they do it well.

We guarantee you will get your book-planner, and we will do everything in our power to get yours to you on time so you can start planning your business soon.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We want to extend our deepest gratitude to everyone for getting us to our first goal! 
LEADING WITH LOVE
There are some bad things going on in the world. We look around and see suffering. Sometimes what we see doesn't make sense, and our life can seem like it’s heading towards chaos…
Those inconceivable circumstances are a wake up call for us to make the decision to become stronger, more strategic, upgraded versions of ourselves, and to choose to operate first and foremost from a place of love. 
Our goal with this book is to help you do just that.  -Bill and Daniele Hargenrader

BILL'S STORY
When I was 8 years old something happened that changed the course of my life forever. I’m one of 7 kids, and one night, one of my brothers set fire to our house. 
No one got hurt, but I got the blame, and I was sent away to a mental institution. 
I'll never forget my first night in the padded cell, crying myself to sleep, hoping that someone would come save me. I woke up the next day, and realized that no one was coming. 
I knew at that moment that it was going to be up to me to figure a way out.
This is a picture of me when I was allowed home from the Mental Institution to visit my family for Christmas.
After failing many times, I finally did figure out a way to gain my freedom. And 11 months later, I returned home to my family. 
However, after being back home for only a month, another fire was set.I was blamed again, and this time I was sent away for 2 more years.
I fought back, once again gained my freedom, and eventually proved my innocence. After many years of struggle and self development, thankfully our family was able to come together and heal. 
Along the way I learned three powerful lessons that became the source of My Greatest Strength: I realized that we don't have to play the role of the victim, but instead, we can choose to be the hero of our own story. 
THE THREE LESSONS
1. The first lesson is the power of love. My parents loved me the whole time. They sent me away out of love, they sent away the wrong kid, but even then, I knew they loved me. Their love was like a life line through the whole experience.
2. The second lesson is the power of forgiveness. My brother has grown up to be a kind and caring husband and father, and he is one of my best friends. He was going through some rough times of his own growing up. Forgiveness gave us the space to heal.
3. And the third lesson is never, ever give up. Since then, I’ve gone on to serve in the Army during Operation Iraqi Freedom III, after 911. I made the best decision of my life in marrying Daniele. I’ve had a successful fifteen year career as a cybersecurity professional, and now as a motivational speaker I get to travel the world sharing with people how they can take their life to the next level, especially after they've been through something they weren't sure they could ever heal from. 
I never would have been able to get to where I am today if I gave up on myself back then, or at any point during the healing process.
These three lessons make up the core of the book, but there's is a lot more to it than that. 
ABOUT THE BOOK
I’ve teamed up with my amazing, heart-centered wife and bestselling author Daniele, to create this book project.  
Together, we’re co-authoring our next book: Love, Forgive, Never Give Up: How to Turn Tragedy Into Triumph, Adversity Into Advantage, and Take Your Life to the Next Level.  
Our mission with this book project is to empower our readers to go beyond self-imposed limitations, reach their maximum potential, and become the hero of their own story, no matter what they’ve been through.
WHY THIS BOOK
We are proud and grateful to have thousands of successful students that we've coached and trained that are making real, sustainable progress towards their biggest goals, and collectively are making the world a better place.
But that's not enough. There are still so many people that are experiencing consistent emotional pain and suffering, however, the answers to our most pressing problems are just out of reach because we get so stuck in our own heads. 
Daniele and I have boiled down the answers and the methods, the strategies and the tactics that we've used time and time again, both with ourselves and countless clients over the past 8 years, and now we are putting them into our book that focuses on three areas of empowerment. 
BOOK SECTION: SET YOUR NEXT LEVEL LIFE VISION AND GOALS
The book starts off with the Next Level Life Vision section. You will be guided through an easy to follow, step by step process that will help you decide what you want your life to look like starting now, and moving forward through the next 10 years, all in bite-sized, easy to process increments.    
Next, we walk you through identifying your major internal motivators that will set you on the path for success, and take you through a priority-focused goal setting process that gives you the clarity necessary to start making “Next Level Decisions.” 
BOOK SECTION: MAKE NEXT LEVEL DECISIONS
Next Level Decisions are integral in achieving sustainable growth in any area. We all make thousands of decisions every day, most of which are unconscious or automatic and don't serve our overall well being. 
The key to positive change is to identify the decisions that have the most impact, and then to consciously and intentionally make the right decisions based on your Next Level Life Vision. This book will teach you how to make these distinctions a matter of habit, freeing up your energy to direct towards what matters most to you.
BOOK SECTION: 33 WAYS TO LOVE, FORGIVE, AND NEVER GIVE UP
The book will feature over 33 short, powerful chapters on specific, actionable ways you can practice more love, forgiveness, and perseverance in your life every single day. Each chapter teaches a crucial, in depth lesson, provides example stories and case studies to show you how to apply it, and is complete with and Take Action section that encourages you to get started right away.  
Here are some of the chapter titles included in the book:  
It Starts With Self-Love 
Give The Love You Need 
The Journey To Self: Why You Need To Journal 
Be For Giving (Selfless Vs Selfish Action) 
Forgiveness Is A Gift You Give Yourself (And Others) 
Live Life At The Next Level (AKA Fake It Til You Make It) 
To Be Great, Start By Being Grateful 
The Five P’s Of Perseverance: Passion, Purpose, Plan, Persistence, And Persistence 
How To Find The Strength In A Perceived Weakness
To Get Ahead… Give Back 
Live Your Life’s Purpose: Find, Create, or Copy
Read the book straight through, or pick out the section you need to work on most in your life. Another massively impactful way to utilize this book is to focus on implementing one lesson in your life for a week at a time, and watch the quality of your thoughts and habits take on an extraordinary new direction.
BOOK SECTION: PROGRESS TRACKER
To ensure you’re making meaningful progress and staying on track with your goals, we’re including a section on how to measure your progress. As a bonus, we’re providing links to bonus materials that will give you access to free online daily progress trackers and checklists to make sure you maximize and sustain your gains!
BOOK SECTION: 99 EXPERTS AND AUTHORS
In this book, we’re not just sharing our experiences, but also the wisdom of 99 experts who have used those three powerful lessons in their own lives time and time again to overcome indomitable challenges and take their lives to places they only dreamed possible including Priya Rana Kapoor, Samara O’Shea, Ron Sparkman, Bershan Shaw, Kip Brooks, Pam Vredevelt, Austin Hill Shaw, Linda Babulic, Andrea Nakayama, Lisa Van Ahn, Joe Donaway, Kelly Standing, Tom Scarda, Kim Julen, Asha Brown, Dr. Jody Stanislaw, Dr. David Anderson, Julie Jacky and many more!
BACKER REWARDS
We have some great rewards we’ve put together for our backers. Together, Daniele and I have backed over 50 Kickstarter campaigns, and created one successfully funded one of our own in the past, so we know the level of value the Kickstarter community has come to expect.
Backers can receive our self-empowerment book that will help you overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles, or you can gift this book to someone you know who is going through a trying time and is looking for guidance on finding a way out of the dark.
For our early bird backers, we’re offering the book at prices lower than suggested retail.
We also have a Companion Journal reward level so you can track your progress and growth as you move through the book. 
We have a couple of exclusive Kickstarter only rewards such as the making of the book, where we meet with you over webinar monthly to follow along with the design and progress of the book's journey.
We also have our 10X Bonus level, where we are offering literally 10X the value of what you pledge in the form of online training in the areas of health, fitness, motivation, mindset, optimized entrepreneurialism and much more.
Daniele and I are fully committed to finishing this book. Your support will help this project be successful by allowing us to get it finished faster, and get it professionally edited, published, and marketed. The most exciting outcome is the massive impact we will have as a community focused on amplifying the message of spreading love, both to ourselves and others.
THANK YOU AND THE MOVEMENT TOWARDS LOVE
The movement towards living our lives from a place of love has already begun. We are a force multiplier, a focusing lens magnifying the power of love. We’re acting as a catalyst. With your help, we will get the movement going faster. 
We are infinitely grateful for you. Thanks for watching/reading, thanks for your support and encouragement, thanks for backing us, and thanks for sharing this project with your family, friends, followers and fans. And remember to Love Strongly, Be Forgiving, and Never, Ever Give Up. 
GIVING BACK – LOVE, FORGIVE, NEVER GIVE UP SCHOLARSHIP
Sadly, some of my classmates from Clearview Regional High School have passed away recently. It made me reflect on how influential my high school years were in shaping who I have become today.   
Daniele and I have decided to dedicate a portion of future book proceeds towards funding the “Love, Forgive, Never Give Up Scholarship.”  
This scholarship will be awarded to selected students who write an essay on how these values have had a positive impact on their life in overcoming tragedy and adversity.  
We are starting with Clearview Regional High School and Northeast High School (Philadelphia), and will look to expand to other schools in the future.
“The secret to living is giving.” -Tony Robbins.
ABOUT US
“Bill is the real deal. I want my leader with battle wounds. I don’t want any leaders who are polished and unscathed. That leadership ain’t working. This is what leadership looks like. This is what it looks like.” -Bo Eason, Former NFL standout, acclaimed Broadway performer, and story coach  
“If every single person living with diabetes could read this book and apply Daniele’s life-changing wisdom, millions of lives would be improved, billions of dollars would be saved, and the face of health in America would be entirely transformed.”  -Dr. Jody Stanislaw, PWD, Naturopathic Doctor, and Author, Hunger
In the last nine years, we have spent more money on coaching, training and masterminds then most pay for a college degree. We’ve mentored and trained with the leading business and personal development influencers in the world including Tony Robbins, Brendon Burchard, Jeff Walker, Bo Eason, Roger Love, Ryan Deiss, Rick Frishman, Steve Harrison, Jack Canfield, Les Brown, and many more.     
We've honed our strategies and systems with our students, and now we are unbelievably excited to be able to share the best of what we’ve learned with you in Love, Forgive, Never Give Up.
Bill Hargenrader
Bill in Tikrit during Operation Iraqi Freedom III in 2005
Bill Hargenrader is a United States Army Veteran, a Fortune 500 Project Management Professional focusing on cybersecurity and innovation, a space & Mars advocate, and founder of Next Level Life, where he focuses on empowering entrepreneurs and artists so we can massively change the world for the better, together. Bill is the bestselling author of the Mars Journey series.
Here is the full version of the talk that was shown in the Kickstarter video. 
Daniele Hargenrader
Daniele giving one of her Interactive Fitness Presentations.
Daniele Hargenrader, aka the Diabetes Dominator, is a nutritionist, certified health coach and personal trainer, international speaker, and entrepreneur. She helps individuals to think, eat, and move in ways that allow them to create the self-love necessary to build a happy, healthy life. She has been featured in the Philadelphia Inquirer, presented at Fortune 500 companies and top-ranked hospitals and universities, and has dedicated herself to teaching people how to live the life they imagined through optimal health. She is the bestselling author of Unleash Your Inner Diabetes Dominator.
DANIELE'S STORY
My story started over 25 years ago from diagnosis with type 1 diabetes at age 9, the unexpected death of my father 3 years later, battling binge eating and depression while ballooning up to 200 lbs with diabetes out of control, and finally deciding to fight back in order to live the life I desired. Now I get to help others live the life they always dreamed was possible.
Watch the video to learn more:  
WHAT THE EXPERTS ARE SAYING
“Daniele's determination to transform her life to what it is today, despite the hardships she has endured, is infectious. She inspires her clients, friends, and the entire diabetes community to live with strength and passion. Anyone will benefit from reading this book.” —Asha Agar Brown, PWD Founder and Executive Director, We Are Diabetes
“Bill has an amazing, vulnerable and heartfelt story to tell that will make you think twice about how you’re approaching your life and business. He is one of the rare few individuals I know who demonstrates what it is to REALLY walk the walk.” -Michael Rozbruch, Founder at Michael Rozbruch’s Tax and Business Solutions Academy
“When I heard Bill’s story I got choked up. To know where he is now after hearing just a fraction of his journey will help dissolve any doubt you have about your own. Bill has every reason to be bitter and cynical yet he is one of the generous and beautiful souls I’ve had the pleasure of meeting. His gratitude for life seems to only be trumped by his passion for helping others. Hearing his story has altered my life in ways that I lack the vocabulary to fully express but I know I am but one of many lives he will change along his journey.” -Kip Brooks, Founder at Rebirth Coaching
"Daniele's story of diving headfirst into change with intention and determination is loaded with inspiration. It fills me with hope, courage, and knowledge that I can make positive, lasting changes in my life! You deserve to know Daniele. You need to know Daniele." —Scott Johnson, PWD Blogger, Patient Advocate, Board Member, Diabetes Hands Foundation
"Bill's story is one of the most incredible examples of perseverance and inner strength there is. His ability to not only overcome, but forgive and move forward is world class." - Brent Seal // CEO of Mavrixx // Mountaineer
This is a human who has been through the fire and come away from the experience as a phoenix. You can't make a diamond without subjecting carbon to extreme pressure. Bill Hargenrader is one of those diamonds. -Kathleen Starmer, founder of the women's emergency preparedness movement 
“Each time I hear Bill share his story of how he was sent to a mental institution for a crime he did not commit, twice, and how he found the strength to overcome the situation (and his darkest times) to choose to become the hero in his life, I not only get inspired to show up even more in my own life, it makes me even more aware of how I easily judge and blame my own children. It reminds me to listen even more full heartedly, seek the truth and most importantly to be more compassionate, loving, understanding and chose to forgive." -Kimberly A. St-Laurent, Founder, KAST Consultation
“Bill Hargenrader is genuine and his zest for life is contagious. You can feel that he is authentic and you want to hear what he has to say. He can show you what it takes to overcome life’s biggest obstacles because he has done it. If you are struggling, don’t miss any opportunity to hear this man speak… you will be forever impacted by his story.” -Donna Harnett, Owner at Give Send Connect
"Sometimes Darkest hours is the best time to see the light within you is the first thing I felt when I read Bill's story. It was truly inspiring and affirmative of Hero's journey through the darkest hours into greatness. His story will surely stir your soul and make you believe in yourself to achieve your greatness." Karti Keyan, Creator of Execution Mastery and Founder of Life Hacker's Academy
"The thing with Bill's experience is that, at its core, it's a very human story. It shares the same struggle we all face: to make the world notice who we truly are as it tries to convince us we're something we're not. His story of overcoming the odds is one that is sure to inspire and motivate you to make the most out of your life." Ron Sparkman, Founder UpportunityU
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always challenges to any project, though with this one, those challenges have been intentionally mitigated. 
I am a Fortune 500 Project Management Professional, and I am managing all the tasks for book creation, reward fulfillment and more. 
Daniele and I have self-published 4 books (all of which have become bestsellers on Amazon), and we have a repeatable, proven system to finish a book from start to finish. 
We will finish the book no matter what! This project will help us do it faster, and get it out to more people! 

The funds raised will help cover costs of production, design, publication, marketing, shipping, and reward fulfillment, and potentially allow us to finish sooner.

If there are any production issues or other factors that could cause a delay, I’ll keep you posted with updates.

updates.update_content: Look what just came in the mail!!!!

Well, sort of - here in Philadelphia, we just got hit with a foot of snow…  
But that’s given us time to work on the next milestone for Love, Forgive, Never Give Up!  
We’ve just completed our physical review of the book in progress after it has gone to our editor for the first revision.

Hey there! Bill and Daniele here, checking in with you on the Love, Forgive, Never Give Up (LFN) Book you’ve helped create!  
We’ve been working hard to finish up LFN, and as we continued to write our stories, thoughts and lessons, the page count grew until we ran into a quality challenge… The book was actually getting to be too big for our intended length!

A book that’s focused and impactful, while allowing people that have different reading styles to experience the benefits on their own terms.

So here’s our solution: We’re going to expand LFN into 2 books, with the first book covering the core concepts along with some actions to take immediately, and the follow on book covering 33 ways to practice Love, Forgiveness, and Perseverance in our lives on a daily basis.



For now, we wanted to let you know that we’ve been thinking of you throughout the year and working on putting out the best book we can.

So Much Love For YOU: A Project Update :)
Happy Valentine’s Day! Today is a great day to be reminded of how powerful choosing to give and receive love is.
Whether we are talking about self-love (which allows us to truly love others), or love between ourselves and others in our lives, we can be sure that consciously choosing love is an empowering choice that we can practice every day.

We want to extend our deepest gratitude to everyone for getting us to our first goal! 
There really aren’t enough words to describe our heartfelt appreciation.
We’re now on to our $12,000 Stretch Goal, and once we’ve reached that, we’ll unlock our Stretch Goal reward: Level Up Your Year - Goal Setting Guide.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank You! And Stretch Goal #1 (With a Bonus)
updates.update_content:
Thank you so much to everyone that backed and shared our project so far! Daniele and I are thrilled and humbled with the incredible reception this book project has been receiving. Only 30% of the way left to reach our first goal!
At the heart of this project is the desire to help others transcend adversities in order to reach new heights of love, happiness, and personal success. One of the best ways to do that is to give back to those who need it most.

campaign.story:
Oh no, the Kickstarter is over! Can I still buy a Passion Planner even though the Kickstarter has ended?
Yes! You may purchase ALL versions of Passion Planner (2015, Undated, Academic, and 2016 Pre-Order) through our website:
http://www.passionplanner.com/
I shared it on social media during the campaign, and I haven’t received my PDF. Where can I get it?
Shoot a message to pdf.passionplanner@gmail.com with proof that you've shared this Kickstarter page (i.e. screenshot or direct link) and we will email you the FULL digital PDF of Passion Planner Academic about a week after the campaign ends!
I didn’t get a chance to share it during the Kickstarter campaign, can I still get the free digital PDF if I share the Kickstarter now?
Because the Kickstarter is no longer live, we ask you to please share our website instead www.passionplanner.com in order to receive the PDF. If you do you will gain access to the Academic PDF which runs from August 2015 to August 2016 and the 2015 download which you can use until we get to August. :)
You can share easily by clicking the following buttons and then emailing us a screenshot at pdf.passionplanner@gmail.com.
Click to share us Facebook! (will not post without your permission)
Click to share us on twitter! (will not post without your permission)
When will I receive my planner?
We will be shipping your planners the Monday ONLY after you answer your survey, so be sure to get them completely filled out ASAP! We will start shipping starting on Monday, (6/22/2015) so get to those surveys! 
How can I keep up with what's going on with the Passion Planner Team and how the project is going post-funding?
You can stay in the loop and check-in with our progress by reading our project updates here on Kickstarter.
For more frequent updates and contest follow/like us on 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/thepassion_planner
Instagram: www.instagram.com/passionplanner
Twitter: www.twitter.com/passion_planner
Lastly if you would like to keep up with my life as a 24 year old entrepreneur you can follow my personal:
Instagram: www.instagram.com/angeliatrinidad
Blog: www.angeliatrinidad.com
I am a backer and the shipping address that I used during checkout is incorrect! Is there any way I can change this?
You will receive an email with the backer survey after the campaign ends which will ask you to input your shipping address. We will ship to the address that you confirm on the survey and ONLY that address so please take extra time to make sure it is correct. 
Have another question that hasn’t been answered here? Please read our Frequently Asked Questions at the bottom of the Kickstarter or our website. If you still have a question you may contact us via our website.
Create your own own lesson plan for life and chase your dreams and goals with Passion Planner... FOR FREE!!! 
Shoot a message to pdf.passionplanner@gmail.com with proof that you've shared this Kickstarter page (i.e. screenshot or direct link) and we will email you the FULL digital PDF of Passion Planner Academic when our Kickstarter ends!
Share us now on:
Please note:This e-mail address is strictly for the PDF. If you have any questions, comments or concerns, we would be happy to answer them via our customer service email: contactpassionplanner@gmail.com
Passion Planner is a paper planner designed with your passions and personal goals in mind. It seamlessly balances functionality, personal reflection and goal setting in one beautiful handcrafted planner.
Since our first launch in November 2013, Passion Planner has helped thousands of people across the world in all areas of life. We’ve helped people achieve their long desired fitness, travel and personal project dreams as well as provide patients with severe illnesses a tool to balance numerous doctor’s visits and endless medications to manage.
We are doing this Kickstarter to launch the Academic version of Passion Planner.
 We believe that Passion Planner could be very beneficial to the academic community:
Structure in an unstructured world
Accountability in meeting goals 
Time management skills
Work, personal and school life balance
Why another Kickstarter?
Along with the Academic Version, we are launching a new program called the Passion Planner: Pay it Forward Program. We believe that Kickstarter is the ideal platform for this, specifically, because we want to put it in front of a group of people who are willing to help one another - and what better than the Kickstarter community?! We will be doing something that no one has ever done before, kind of like our own social experiment.
 Inner Specs:
Annual goal setting guide to help you brainstorm, define, and create actions for your goals your one month, 1 year, 3 year and lifetime goals
Weekly layouts (Sunday - Monday) that run from the beginning of August 2015 to the beginning of August 2016 
Annual and monthly overview calendars 
Monthly check in reflection questions to get you thinking about progress, gratitude and steps for improvement 
Additional gridded pages
Outer Specs:
Soft and durable faux leather cover; animal and vegan friendly! 
Super smooth high quality 100 gsm thick paper, about twice as thick as a standard sheet of printer paper to resist ink bleeding from fountain pens 
"Kickstarter green" bookmarking ribbon 
Elastic enclosure strap 
Durable fabric pocket in the back
About 200 pages 
Available in Classic (8.5” x 11”) and Compact (5.5” x 8.5”) sizes
Faux leather embossing! So subtle yet still bold.
Kickstarter green ribbon and it lays flat!
Soft cover... so friendly feeling!
The money will be solely used in the first large scale production of Passion Planner Academic, including manufacturing and shipping.
Through our new Pay It Forward program, people have the opportunity to take it a step further. You can either purchase a planner (at a discounted rate) for someone in need or pledge to receive a planner for free if you cannot afford one.
Here's how it works:
1) Someone who cannot afford a planner signs a pledge to become a potential recipient here.
2) A sponsor buys a planner at a discounted price for a recipient. (Passion Planner will take care of shipping costs!)
3) Recipient gets a planner with his or her sponsor's name and email address
4) Recipient will then send a thank you letter at the beginning and end of the year.
5) The recipient is encouraged to become a future sponsor.
I believe in this program so much that I will match the first 500 sponsorships, meaning you will be sponsoring 2 people for the price of one.
Over the past few months, we experienced huge growing pains and we cannot thank you enough for having our backs!
We've improved in many aspects such as:
Our staff is now 35-strong! All incoming emails are answered within one business day and new planner orders are shipped within 1 to 2 days. Woohoo!
We've created, tried and tested game plans for us to run smoothly and for potential obstacles
We coordinated with our manufacturer as well as our shipping company to ensure that your planners will be delivered on time
We are Kickstarter veterans!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As of right now, the only challenge we see is getting this product out to our backers as soon as possible.

We hope you understand that setbacks do arise in terms of manufacturing and shipping - we learned this especially with our last Kickstarter in 2014.

With that said, we believe that we are more prepared than ever to overcome any obstacle that comes our way this time around. We have created a game plan that will help our fulfillment process run smoothly. And if any obstacle arises, we promise not to leave you guys in the dark. Over the past few months, we have developed a great customer service team to make sure our backers and customers are satisfied.

All we ask in advance is for patience and that our backers please respond to the information survey as quickly as possible after this Kickstarter ends so we can get your planner in your hands ASAP!

Since our first Kickstarter, we’ve come a long way. We’re excited for you to join us on the next chapter of our journey!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
